Description.Title: Conductance model
Description.Authors: Peter D. Jamieson, Glen S. Francis, Derick R. Wilson, Robert J. Martin
Description.Institution: New Zealand Institute for Crop and Food Research Ltd., New Zealand Institute for Crop and Food Research Ltd., New Zealand Institute for Crop and Food Research Ltd., New Zealand Institute for Crop and Food Research Ltd.
Description.ExtendedDescription: The boundary layer conductance is expressed as the wind speed profile above the canopy and the canopy structure. The approach does not take into account buoyancy effects.

Input.name: heightWeatherMeasurements
Input.description: reference height of wind and humidity measurements

Input.name: zm
Input.description: roughness length governing momentum transfer, FAO

Input.name: zh
Input.description: roughness length governing transfer of heat and vapour, FAO

Input.name: d
Input.description: corresponding to 2/3. This is multiplied to the crop heigth for calculating the zero plane displacement height, FAO
